Generated Narrative: ValueSet

Expansion done internally based on codesystem Composition Status v5.0.0 (CodeSystem)

This value set contains 3 concepts

CodeSystemDisplayDefinition
  preliminaryhttp://hl7.org/fhir/composition-statusPreliminary

Verified early results are available, but not all results are final.

  finalhttp://hl7.org/fhir/composition-statusFinal

This version of the composition is complete and verified by an appropriate person and no further work is planned. Any subsequent updates would be on a new version of the composition.

  cancelledhttp://hl7.org/fhir/composition-statusCancelled

The composition is unavailable because the measurement was not started or not completed (also sometimes called "aborted").
